## SignNode class

Extracts the sign of a value

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class SignNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns -1 if x &lt; 0, 0 if x = 0, +1 if x &gt; 0. Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
